project.description: We only have this parent to give us consistent versions of dependencies across different composities. Sometimes, libraries are released in "waves" - even though only 1 or 2 artifacts change, projects often release all of the artifacts together. Ideally they would just release individual artifacts that change and create a composite that is a "named" release version, which would significantly decrease the library churn and allow faster turnaround of patching (as items of a library do not need to release together).
